creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: long branch of plum blossoms with two major side branches and a sharp L bend near center; two columns of calligraphy with a single character and two red chops to L; one red chop at LLC; two red chops stacked in LRC
markings: five untranslated red chops: two beside calligraphy, one at LLC and two stacked in LRC
portfolio: From from the album "Three Friends of Winter"
title: Leaf from album "Three Friends of Winter"
